author: breser
msg: On 'svn-auth-x509' branch, add comment to help avoid some ambiguity.
(x509_get_version): Document that the version has the context specific tag
of 0 so as to be clear that '| 0' is not a mistake but more a documentation.

author: breser
msg: On 'svn-auth-x509' branch: Don't dereference pointers that might be outside the
the tag from the pointer before checking the length, which asn1_get_tag()
does for us.  It also compares the tag to the one we ask for, so where
we want to store the tag, store it explicilty rather than from the tag.

author: thejas
msg: HIVE-8557 : automatically setup ZooKeeperTokenStore to use kerberos authentication when kerberos is enabled (Thejas Nair, reviewed by Vaibhav Gumashta)

author: ggregory
msg: Statement unnecessarily nested within else clause.

author: jdere
msg: HIVE-8579: Guaranteed NPE in DDLSemanticAnalyzer (Jason Dere, reviewed by Vaibhav Gumashta)
